api.graphics

Class SpriteManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.graphics.SpriteManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animation

    public class SpriteManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to instantiate a manager object for every entity that controls it's Sprites and make it easy for a user to choose which Sprite to display Also includes functionality to loop between various Sprites for animations
    Version:
    June 26th, 2015
    Author:
    Jonathan Zwiebel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Drawable> drawableElements
      An ArrayList that will hold all of the Drawable elements, Sprites and Animations, that this object can manage

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.awt.Graphics g,
                   java.lang.String activeDrawable)
        Called periodically with game updates, this will update the Sprite to be shown and called the Animation update method
        Parameters:
        g - an AWT Graphics object
        activeDrawable - the name of the current Sprite or Animation to display
